name: Astro-Knyte
description:
Journey through a castle drifting through space as a knight who is searching for their lost memories. Defeat enemies, traverse randomly sequenced rooms, and repeat with new loot. At the end of every loop, fight the man that stole your memories, and live again. Who knows what may happen when you defeat him 5 times in a single loop...

Keyboard.
    A - Left
    D - Right
    J - Attack
        Mouse-Click  - Attack
    Space - Jump
        Escape - Pause / View Inventory
    
Gameplay.
    Destroy all enemies in a     room to clear a room

    Clear 5 rooms to fight a
    powerful foe

    Defeat the powerful foe
    5 times to win the game!

Currently Only 1920x1080 is supported :( 

This results in some weird UI Jank on the main menu. Sorry!
